Package org.consensusj.jsonrpc

Interface JsonRpcService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JsonRpcServiceWrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJsonRpcService, DelegatingJsonRpcService, EchoJsonRpcService, MathService, WalletAppKitJsonRpcService

    public interface JsonRpcService

    Asynchronous JSON-RPC Server/Service

    A service-layer abstraction of JSON-RPC using plain old Java objects (POJOs) Can easily be used in controllers from Java Web frameworks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> CompletableFuture<JsonRpcResponse<T>> call(JsonRpcRequest req)
      Handle a JSON-RPC Request POJO and return a Response POJO

        Handle a JSON-RPC Request POJO and return a Response POJO

        Returns:
